programme.title: Booked: First Day In
programme.desc: In Modesto, two men struggle with high bail amounts, and a 'frequent flyer' ends up back in jail after having a little too much boxed wine.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story
programme.desc: This special details the ups and downs of the tragic road trip through the lens of Gabby's social media presence. Told by the people who knew her best and a community of online strangers and cyber sleuths.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a 70-year-old Vietnam vet is found beaten to death in his home where detectives discover threatening letters. In New Orleans, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot behind a store.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Gwinnett County detectives investigate the murder of an innocent fifteen-year-old, caught up in a petty crime. But how will the prosecution take on a witness who claims the shooter acted in self-defense?

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An angry defendant flips off the judge during a virtual hearing; a victim is cross-examined by her accused attacker; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused stalker screams expletives at the judge; a shooting victim's mother cries for justice; an assistant prosecutor argues with the judge; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Thai actor witnessed the exorcism of a Phi Pop (a cannibalistic female spirit) in his village when he was a child, while in Philippines, an uncle brings supernatural beings into his relative's house.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Palm and Neung were both taken aback by their sister, Song's sudden change of personalities overnight, but when asked about her actions, Song had no recollection of them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless search for other Night Furies.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and must escape Outcast Island.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die – and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus’ piano before his recital and he can’t practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, “Bridges Aflame.” Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.desc: Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Toothless encounters a rival from his past.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.desc: When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy checks out the landscapes of Kakadu; he chats with traditional owner Mandy Muir who takes Jimmy to see her country on a boat trip along the Yellow Waters.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the heart of Costa Rica, to discover several fabulous Eden-like biotopes, and see the unprecedented efforts that are made every day to preserve, and in some cases restore, this exceptional natural heritage.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the heart of Costa Rica, to discover several fabulous Eden-like biotopes, and see the unprecedented efforts that are made every day to preserve, and in some cases restore, this exceptional natural heritage.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs get trained to be sniffer dogs, protection dogs and search and rescue dogs in Austria. In the USA, dogs help to locate people trapped on the mountain and dogs who help guard the farms from wolves and coyotes.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Examine the deaths linked to a world-famous axe murderer. Find out what really happened to Lizzie Bordon’s victims through newly uncovered evidence, 3D graphics, and a reenactment with a ballistic corpse.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Explore the mysterious death of musician and Rolling Stones founder Brian Jones. Was it the rock-and-roll lifestyle or foul play? See how new videotapes and a virtual autopsy bring light to a story that’s been painted black.

programme.title: Chadwick Boseman: The King
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman’s performances elevated the biographical genre, he became the definition of bringing heroes to life. He was always acting, always writing, always kind. He not only played a superhero. He became a hero.

programme.title: Ryan Reynolds: Funny Business
programme.desc: "Ryan Reynolds: Funny Business" is a documentary tracing the actor's rise from Vancouver to Hollywood, exploring his comedic evolution, personal life, mental health, philanthropy, and social media mastery.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and anthropologist Mary-Ann Ochota journey back 34,000 years to investigate a mysterious set of red bones and wind up hunting for woolly mammoths and zombies.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota seek the legendary British king. Clive meets a real Merlin and tries to wield Excalibur, while Mary-Ann sits at the Round Table and searches for Arthur’s final resting place to discover the truth behind the legend.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu Feildel has a dream to follow in the footsteps of Jules Vernes’ Around the World in 80 days. So Manu sets himself a challenge to circumnavigate the world, through his food loving eyes. Will he make it? First stop - London.

programme.desc: Ruby and her friends struggle to grant the wish of a very intimidating and mysterious wisher.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Reporter Grover is on the street finding out if people, monsters, and fairies can be friends even if they’re of different ages, cheering for different sports teams, and like to do different things.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Grover and his friend, the octopus, are helping at Hooper’s Store but the octopus can only cook bread. With help from his friends, Grover fulfills his customer’s orders while learning that families all over the world make bread in different kinds of ways.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Gabrielle, and Rosita join a basketball team! When Coach Jones start calling Rosita, “Rosie,” her friends encourage her to tell the coach that her name is “Rosita.” Rosita is proud of her name and names are a big part of who we are.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Gabrielle, Charlie, and Abby are having a sleepover! As they start their bedtime routines, they learn that they have routines both different and alike.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo shares his scooter with Zoe and learns how to be patient and wait for his turn, while she practices and learns how to ride.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Frankie the worm wants to play with her cousins, but they moved to another planter. Rosita, Gabrielle, and Zoe think like engineers to help Frankie. What if we build a bridge that connects the planters? Let’s try!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo and Abby help Crystal the Ball come up with a morning routine so she can be ready to go out and play.

programme.desc: A retired marshal and his new bride learn that a killer whom the marshal sent to jail is coming back to town on the noon train, seeking revenge. Deserted by his friends and former deputies, he faces the killer and his gang alone.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Russia House
programme.desc: A British publisher is sent a manuscript detailing Soviet Union nuclear missile capabilities. British Intelligence intercept it and recruit him to investigate the author's editor, a beautiful Russian woman he claims never to have met.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The infamous Musketeers are joined by spirited young swordsman D'Artagnan, as they embark on a mission to retrieve a stolen piece of jewelry for the Queen. However, their task is complicated by the evil tyrant Cardinal Richelieu.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Volume 2
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in Kill Bill, Vol. 2, as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: The next installment in the Mission Impossible franchise. Super-spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) has retired from active duty to train new IMF agents. But he is called back into action to confront the toughest villain he's ever faced - Owen Davian (Philip Seymour Hoffman), an international weapons and information provider with no remorse and no conscience. Hunt assembles his team - his old friend Luther Strickell (Ving Rhames), transportation expert Declan (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), background operative Zhen (Maggie Q), and fresh recruit Lindsey (Keri Russell) - to travel the globe pursuing Davian and rescue Hunt's love, Julia (Michelle Monaghan).

And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The chefs face their toughest Mystery Box challenge yet – fish! When the chefs with immunity are able to switch up the other contestants’ fish, the competition starts to fire up.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: Contestants cater to the average sports fan while incorporating elements from their region, and the chef with immunity is tasked with giving a penalty to the home cook of their choosing.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining nine home cooks are tasked with firing up their grills and preparing a restaurant quality barbecue plate that is guaranteed to impress the judges.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The chefs face their biggest challenge yet: a 55-foot wall. The chef with immunity is tasked with pairing contestants to cook on opposite sides of the wall, where they must rely on great communication.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Mya and Kennedy moved from the big city to the small town of Front Royal, VA when Mya had an opportunity to buy her Grandmother's old home. After four years, they desperately need more space.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Nine years ago, Sonny and Kristin moved into their first house together. Since then, their family has grown with the birth of two boys. And now they are finding that their space no longer works for them.

programme.title: Wrath: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Single lawyer Chastity meets Xavier, who seems to be everything she is looking for in a partner, but his jealousy and anger lead to suspicious actions and dangerous threats.

programme.title: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A young author buys the apartment of her dreams, but strange sounds begin to alarm her, along with a feeling of being watched. As she learns the history of the apartment, she uncovers a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Airline Wars
programme.desc: Airline drama is at an all-time high and we've got the viral videos to prove it. See what happens when people are caught on camera acting up and acting out. We're headed for the not-so-friendly skies.

programme.title: Airline Wars
programme.desc: Bystanders, police, and airport staff attempt to take down an aggressive man at a Singaporean airport. Fellow passengers rush to help when an expectant mother goes into labor mid-flight.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Curtis Stone returns to the MasterChef kitchen tonight as, fresh from their service challenge win, Adi, Rue, Ralph, Rhiannon and Brent arrive for a two-round immunity challenge with a life-changing twist!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Despite it being a dreaded black-apron day today in the MasterChef Kitchen for our Top 10, there is also a ray of sunshine... in the form of guest judge Maggie Beer!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s explosive Mystery Box presents an exciting and challenging task for our Top 9 contestants – in 75 minutes, they must create a dish with an unexpected element to surprise the judges!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: It’s Pressure Test time, and after plating up the bottom three dishes in the recent surprise Mystery Box challenge, Ralph, Malissa and Rhiannon must now set about cooking for their spot in the Top 8.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Taking inspiration from their surroundings - the Temple of Boom, an evocative reimagining of the ancient Greek Acropolis - the final eight split into two teams to add a contemporary twist to Greek food.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES Himeji The Defense
programme.desc: Himeji Castle with its white keep is one of Japan's most famous castles. But its beauty is deceiving. The paths to the keep follow the hill's gradient and hold many surprises for potential attackers.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Decoding the i-SOON Document Leaks
programme.desc: Teaming with experts in 7 locations around the world, we conducted an analysis of internal records leaked from a Chinese cybersecurity company, delving into the new threats spreading on the internet.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: PLANET TAXI: A Ride Through Taipei
programme.desc: World cities seen through taxi windows and conversations with the drivers. This time in Taipei, a city of high-rises and temples, tradition and innovation. A journey both personal and profound begins.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: East of Eden (a five-piece all-female heavy metal band fronted by a violinist) and edhiii boi (an up-and-coming rapper with a strong teenage following).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-1.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at scissors. After arriving in Japan, they evolved in unique ways.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: What's it like living with cats in rice-producing Niigata? See kitty beds made of straw from beautiful green rice paddies, and enjoy snacks with another kitty at a candy shop.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: A ride through Hokkaido in early summer. We meet an artisan teaching handicrafts of the indigenous Ainu to the next generation, and a legendary trainer of an unusual horse race.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Underthe Lid
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Under the Lid.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #1
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Facing the Mediterranean Sea, Menton, a city in France, is famous for its mild subtropical climate and celebrated for its delicious lemons. The townscape also still retains its 13th century charm.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: RAMEN JAPAN
programme.desc: A gourmet tour of ramen all around Japan. This time: the birthplace of tonkotsu, Fukuoka. Looking at the Hakata and Nagahama styles, we'll learn these ramens' secrets, and the story of its creation.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The Maki-e lacquering technique uses gold dust on a jet-black background to dazzling effect.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Ngoc-san, from Vietnam, wants to help a new coworker sitting next to him and become a great senior, Senpai. To know and understand the proper way, Ngoc-san will tackle a role-play.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: With a falling birthrate, school closures are on the rise in Japan, and things like desks and chairs have no place to go. Doi Kenji upcycles these discards into stylish and unique interior items.

programme.desc: It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mrs. Puff's new substitute teacher gives SpongeBob a crash course in driving. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton must work together after discovering a well of miracle-grease under their restaurants.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When kaiju besties Modirah and Gakaiju have a falling out, Deuce is determined to play peacemaker and fix their friendship. // Manny grows attached to an adorable undead frog during a class project and is unwilling to de-animate it.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie's school project tops the gaming charts as an online sensation! Rapper Double G finds out they used his song and comes to collect his share. Despite their differences, the group teams up to create Game Shakers!

programme.title: 100 Things To Do Before High School

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: In what appears to be a serendipitous encounter upon saving the life of a stranger, the calculated and reserved businessman Nick (Aga Muhlach) meets the impulsive and optimistic photographer Ali (Bea Alonzo), who believes in destiny and carpe diem.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: A Glimpse of Forever
programme.desc: Glenda (Jasmine Curtis-Smith) pursues comfort in virtual dating to make up for the lack of romance from her real-life partner. But what was meant to be make-believe may turn out to be a genuine connection.

programme.title: Weyt A Minit, Kapeng Mainit
programme.desc: Dik and Ado are waiters in popular Italian restaurant where two warring syndicates are holding talks for a possible compromise. But when one syndicate attacks the other, only the two waiters manage to survive the massacre.

programme.title: Banyo Queen
programme.desc: Angelie (Rica Peralejo) comes from a family of sorceress. As a tradition, everyone should have a virgin sacrifice before their 18th birthday to escape the curse. With the help of her Aunt Chada (Mystica), she hunts a virgin to stay alive.

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara and Minerva, the two women who shared the same man, meet again when their son and daughter, respectively, are about to marry each other.

programme.title: Pagdating ng Panahon

programme.title: Xenoa 2

The other siblings- Eli and Zeus learned that Clyde started to act strange and unfortunate things are happening around.

programme.title: Katawan

programme.title: Krisanta, Iba Ka
programme.desc: The core of life starts in innocence until, outside force affect mentality that will change everything. This film will surely reawaken physical desire and lustful thoughts.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island

What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must work together to unveil the truth behind their isolation. As terrifying events unfold, nothing really is as it seems…

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: À La Recherche Du Légume Star
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Rivière À L'Envers
programme.desc: On the Island of Lost Sailors, everything has gone awry between Tomek and Hannah. Under Alyia's influence, Hannah seems to have lost all hope. Tomek, determined to come to the aid of his friend, heads off alone to confront the mysterious witch and free them from this open-air prison.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Situated between Surinam and Brazil, French Guiana is the largest French department, covered 95% by the Amazon forest. As a result of its history and geographical location, it is a genuine cultural melting pot.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses
programme.desc: That faithful look in the eye and little barrel around the neck: the Saint Bernard is the perfect emblem of Switzerland. With a heart of gold, the animal appreciates human contact: he continues to fulfil his rescue mission and, today, is even used as a support dog.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Un Dimanche À La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: La Fille D'albino Rodrigue
programme.desc: Rosemay, aged 16, lives with a foster family and only sees her biological family during the holidays. One day, her father doesn't turn up at the train station to collect her. Since he doesn't reappear and her mother gives only evasive replies, the teenager begins to fear the worst...

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: Four national languages, as many cultural regions, twenty cantons: how did Switzerland manage to build a nation and have such a high GDP? How does the country face climate change? And why does it allow assisted suicide and is about to legalize the sale of cannabis?

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Suffering from dystonia after catching malaria in Angola, Orvedi Claudio learnt to deal with a difficult body. Helped by his mother, who wanted to give him a better future, he came to France. Now studying at the prestigious Henri IVcollege, he is cultivating his passion for literature.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie

programme.title: Normandie Ne Partira Pas Ce Soir
programme.desc: It was the world's largest, most beautiful and fastest cruise ship. Built in Saint Nazaire in 1932, the ''Normandie'' was the pride of France. But it took only a few hours, amidst the chaos of World War Two, for this dream of grandeur to lie broken in New York harbour.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Ce Qui A Été Et Ce Qui Restera...
programme.desc: For the last fifteen years, Thomas Fisch has travelled the Sahel and northern Niger in search of the Wodaabe Fula. Renowned for their cattle herds, the migrations of this nomadic people depend on the vagaries of weather and politics. Today some prefer to settle, whilst others maintain their traditional values.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Au Nom De Nos Ancêtres, Esclaves Et Négociants
programme.desc: Aurélie Bambuck and Axelle Balguerie share the same history: their ancestors participated in the transatlantic slave trade. One is the descendent of slaves while the other is the heiress of traders. The two women face up to their past and lay the foundations of an appeased memory. Encounter.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo, known as “The King of Misfortune”, fights to survive an assassination attempt with the help of his loyal servant, who has a secret connection to the assassin.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Bottom Of The Water
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Jihye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker who has a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A demonstration against urban renewal project leads to death of a police and a teenage boy. The boy's father, who claims he's innocent, was arrested for the cop's death.

programme.title: The World of the Married
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.

programme.title: Campus Beat
programme.desc: The 15-year old Aga personifies the young man of the times. He is living a normal teen-age life, doing a balancing act between his separated parents, his family and his friends, his studies and his love for music and the beginnings of young love.

programme.title: Laglag Barya Gang
programme.desc: Ike Lozada has been given the task to nurture and shelter homeless children. Unable to make ends meet, he taught his children to become street hustlers.

programme.title: Basagulero
programme.desc: Berto Banal (Ronnie Ricketts) is a hoodlum with a conscience. He can't abide taking advantage of other poor people yet he has no qualms on robbing a usurer.

programme.title: Alyas Waway
programme.desc: Waway was the notorious mad killer who ran circles around the people of Metro Manila during the 70's. Based on real-life events and features Cesar Montanos as Waway in one of his best performances.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Barumbado
programme.desc: A young hoodlum spawned and raised by a tough neighborhood goes out looking for love and an escape from the harsh realities of everyday life.

programme.title: Puto (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Herbert played a puto vendor. He was the constant butt of jokes but remained good-natured, helpful and kind to everybody. Taking pity on him, a dwarf decided to give him special powers.

programme.title: Bangkay Mo Akong Hahakbangan
programme.desc: Join the King of Stunts, Dante Varona, on this deadly game on hide and seek and of vengeance and justice.

programme.title: Paradise Inn
programme.desc: A story about the relationship between a mother and her daughter in a situation where everybody is a snake and with vested interest.

programme.title: Apat na Anak ni Adan
programme.desc: This movie centers on the relationship among four brothers and their collective exploits.

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.title: Magkapalad
programme.desc: In a world dictated by greed and lawlessness, two hearts find each other and fall in love.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: The Flash S9 13
programme.desc: The Flash, the fastest man alive, is tasked with his greatest challenge yet, to save the timeline and save existence. Friends gather to save Central City, one last time.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 1
programme.desc: Superman is locked in a brutal battle with Luthor’s monster; Lois and the boys race against time to save General Lane.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 2
programme.desc: Lana and Sarah join the fight against Luthor, who starts making moves in Smallville. Jordan and Jonathan butt heads over an important decision.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. Sal, Murr, Q, and Joe serve up some mischief at White Castle, take on tourists in Times Square, and check out customers in a warehouse store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys get liberal with lotion down at the shore, shop from other people's carts in a supermarket, and try to scam their way to a free dish of yogurt.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys approach strangers with humiliating one liners on the streets of New York, play a unique word game in a grocery store, and try to get shoppers to hop in a trunk at a car dealership.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys tackle speed dating with the world's worst pickup lines, read phony fortunes on the boardwalk, and get too personal with shoppers in the hygiene aisle of apharmacy.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 15
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 13
programme.desc: What's one of Brooke's favorite pastimes when she's not hacking? Which lifesaving hack has Kevin used while swimming? Get the behind-the-scenes scoop on your favorite hacks on Inside Hacks!

programme.title: Friends S5 22
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler take a road trip to Las Vegas, where Joey has landed the lead role in a movie. But the two argue and Joey goes on alone. Rachel has an eye infection.

programme.title: Friends S5 23
programme.desc: The gang decides to go out to Las Vegas to surprise Joey and to celebrate Monica's and Chandler's one-year anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S5 24
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler get lucky in Las Vegas, Nevada. Rachel makes Ross regret playing a prank on her. Joey schemes for fame and fortune.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers – and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Friends S6 2
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica tell Joey and Rachel that they want to live together. Monica is hurt that Rachel doesn't react as strongly as Joey. Phoebe tries to find out how Ross really feels about Rachel.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 10
programme.desc: Papa Bear sees a clue in a bin that leads him to believe there's a shotgun hidden in it. Lori teams up with Jesse behind Brandon's back to win the big specialty item at the end of the day. Brandon's anger turns to joy once it's revealed to be an antique fire engine.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 11
programme.desc: At an auction set in wine and horse country, Jesse and David, aka the Leprechaun, spar over bins they hope will have wine in them. Brandon and Lori win a beautiful pristine horse trailer; but the real treasure turns out to be what's inside - a hot air balloon!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 12
programme.desc: Jesse wins a bin that turns out to include a giant pad for stuntmen to land on when they jump out of tall buildings. Meanwhile, Papa Bear wins a vintage 1970's British sportscar -but he can't fit into it!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 13
programme.desc: The grand finale is an airport auction with giant hangars filled with cool stuff, including arcade games, lighting equipment, and a vintage El Camino. The most unlikely team-up yet occurs when Brandon and Lori join forces with Mone to win the final item of the day - a helicopter!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 14
programme.desc: Sean tows a mysterious trailer to the auction and everyone wonders what's inside. T Money and Papa Bear battle over bins while Brandon and Lori play different kinds of games.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 1
programme.desc: On the fifth season premiere, Penny worries that she's screwed things up permanently with her friends after her night with Raj, while Sheldon takes command of the paintball team.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 2
programme.desc: A battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya (AARTI MANN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 3
programme.desc: Attending a co-worker's wedding, Leonard and Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 4
programme.desc: When Raj is upset he's the only one of the four guys who's not in a relationship, Penny sets out to find the perfect date, introducing him to Emily, a girl he can actually talk to!

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 9
programme.desc: Hoping that old toys bring new joy and lots of money, the Direstas attempt to create a giant Lite Brite coffee table.

programme.title: Kandahar
programme.desc: A CIA Black Ops agent and his Afghan interpreter must evade deadly forces as they escape Iran after a whistleblower reveals the agent destroyed a nuclear facility.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 1
programme.desc: News of the tornado reaches Sheldon and Mary in Germany. Also, with the Cooper house in chaos, Missy steps up, on the season seven premiere of YOUNG SHELDON.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 2
programme.desc: Sheldon realizes he is the weakest student in his class; Meemaw is looking to expand her gambling business.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To The Big Dig
programme.desc: In Double Takes, Michael jumps back in time and unleashes unseen content for a fresh spin on classic Carbonaro bits.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 02
programme.desc: While Riggs & Murtaugh investigate an illegal drug ring run out a wellness clinic, things heat up when DEA Agent Karen Palmer competes with Riggs to solve the case first.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 03
programme.desc: When Riggs & Murtaugh investigate the mysterious death of the bodyguard of a famous singer (JOJO), Murtaugh turns to his daughter to learn more about possible suspects.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 04
programme.desc: Investigating an in-flight robbery, Riggs & Murtaugh hunt for an unreliable father whose daughter is their main witness. Meanwhile, Murtaugh faces hostility from his own daughter.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 05
programme.desc: Investigating the murder of a winner of a horse race, Riggs and Murtaugh are aided in the investigation by Leo Getz (THOMAS LENNON) who insists it's a homicide.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 06
programme.desc: Reunited with his childhood friends, Riggs comes to realize that they might be mixed up in the robbery-homicide case he and Murtaugh are investigating.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 9
programme.desc: Michael gives a confused woman the license to speed at the DMV, unclogs a "crumby" toaster at a return counter, and blows the mind of a beach attendant with a scaly encounter from under the sea!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 10
programme.desc: Michael schools a man on fish fossil breeding at a rock store and colors with his tongue at a paint store. Then, on a construction site, Michael and his helper dig up a skeleton that still has some life in it.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Get your credit cards ready, because TruTV is coming at you with 20 all new inventions that will both horrify and delight! We've got a loop to make pooping in the woods even more exciting, a way to cool your man parts for optimal baby making, and asound system for the great beyond that will blow the lid off of your coffin. Supplies may be limited, but the jokes from our cast sure aren't, featuring Judy Gold, Jared Logan, and Bryan Callen.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 07
programme.desc: While Riggs & Murtaugh investigate the death of a surfer, Murtaugh grows suspicious of Trish's new friend SCOTTIE PIPPEN, while Riggs has violent nightmares from his childhood.
